description: Job DescriptionResideois seeking a Senior Manager, Product Marketing, Consumer, responsible for leading our integrated marketing campaigns driving strategy, planning and execution across our key audiences and brands. The Senior Manager, Product Marketing, Consumer will work cross functionally to ensure all brand touchpoints and communications are consumer-centric and tie to the overall brand vision, building upon the brand equity, while meeting business goals.JOB DUTIES:Plays a key role in driving the brand vision, strategy, and activation plan for P&S categories. Ensures that all touchpoints and communications tie to brand standards and vision.Oversees development and management of community outreach and public relations strategy.Drives the traditional and digital efforts for P&S including brand website management, content development, national digital display, SEO/M, macro and micro influencer programs, digital radio, collateral asset development including POP and signage.Responsible for content needs for Amazon and retail.comWorks in collaboration with PR team and agency to draft news releases, media advisories and pitches. Supports crisis management as needed.Manages marketing vendor relationships and reporting in collaboration with Analytics Team.Manages the creation of assets for the brand, including videos, digital assets, print materials and copy.Assists in the development and management of brand building activities, shopper marketing strategies and tactics, and brand partnerships.Helps drive flawless execution of deliverables for new launches and campaigns.Helps manage and distribute creative requests with Creative Team.Leverages market research to drive fact-based, consumer-centric decisions that support our brand leadership positioning as it relates to brand and communication.Represents integrated marketing efforts in Strategic meetings, including ESG forums, CX/CS Committee, NPI planning, Retail partner presentations, Technology/Business partner presentations.Assists in the management of the A&P Budget.YOU MUST HAVE:Bachelor's degree required: Marketing or Public Relations, MBA is a plus.Minimum 7+ brand and PR marketing experience in consumer driven industries and leading a team.Proven track record of delivering extraordinary results in a fast-paced and challenging environment. Attention to detail and time management skills are critical.Must be a team player, capable of taking direction and initiative in context of complex and shifting priorities. Ability to work and influence in a cross functional environment to develop solutions to complex business problems.Ability to synthesize and draw insights and implications from multiple sets of information.Strong written and verbal communication skills; Ability to explain technical information in a way that establishes rapport, persuades others, and fosters understanding.Ability to multitask and deliver projects in a timely manner.WE VALUE:Efficient, results oriented.Services Product Marketing ExperienceAbility to manage multiple tasks and ensure all timelines are met.A self-starter that is comfortable working independently as well as cross functionally.Experience working in a deadline-oriented environment with a high attention to quality.Superior oral and written communication skills.Competent in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook).Passion for working in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU :A comprehensive benefits package including life and health insurance, life assistance program, accidental death and dismemberment insurance, disability insurance, retirement plans, vacation & holidays.Technology and leadership mentoring to ensure you are setup for successOpportunity to work for a growing company with many opportunities for career advancementWork in a Hybrid setting (3 days in office, 2 days remote)Enjoy work-life balance with generous vacation time that can be scheduled with manager approval based on business priorities and personal needs, without pre-set maximums.#LI-MH1About UsResideo is a leading global provider of critical comfort and security solutions primarily in residential environments and distributor of low-voltage electronic and security products. Building on a 130-year heritage, Resideo has a presence in more than 150 million homes, with 15 million systems installed in homes each year. We continue to serve more than 110,000 professionals through leading distributors, including our ADI Global Distribution business, which exports to more than 100 countries from more than 200 stocking locations around the world. Resideo is a $5.0 billion company with approximately 13,000 global employees. For more information about Resideo, please visit www.resideo.com.At Resideo, we bring together diverse individuals to build the future of homes. Resideo is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status. For more information on applicable U.S. equal employment regulations, refer to the "EEO is the Law" poster, "EEO is the Law" Supplement Poster and the Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision. Resideo complies with applicable equal employment laws in all countries where we do business. For more information on how we process your information in the job application process, please refer to Recruitment Privacy Notice. If you require a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job, please use Contact Us form for assistance.#J-18808-Ljbffr
